name: exeunt
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an instruction written in a play meaning that two or more characters leave the stage: Act 1, Scene 1 Exeunt all but the King. Exeunt LADY JONES and LORD DARNFORD.
More examplesFewer examplesExeunt: Sir John Falstaff, the Caricaturist, a Midget- pursued by a Dog."Some Cupid kills with arrows, some with traps." Exeunt Hero and Ursula.Exeunt, bearing the dead bodies.Exeunt OTHELLO, DESDEMONA and ATTENDANTS.
